doc.title: The Man from U.N.C.L.E.

credit.role: Inga Bergstrum wrongly listed as Inga Anderson in on-screen credits)
Madame Alceste Streigau, aka Dr. Egret
Dr. Faust - UNCLE Medical Staff Member
Hassan Askoy (in photo)/Omar Askoy/Karim Askoy/Ali Askoy

doc.plot: Napoleon Solo and Illya Kullyakin are the two agents of the United Network Command for Law Enforcement, who fight evil (primarily an organization of Bad people called, THRUSH) and use charm, wit, and a never ending assortment of gadgets. Ran for 4 years.
